Room.Name: Necropolis Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are at a bend in a the path you are traveling through the Necropolis.
Room.LongDescription: The Great Fighters Hall is southeast of here, and the Tomb of Eldritch is east. The chill wind brings sounds you really don't want to hear... a cacophony of wailing and groaning. At times it almost dies down to a low moan, but it never ceases. No doubt it is restless souls turning over in their graves. However, as you look around you realize you really don't see any grave sites near hear, but only a vacant plot of bare ground.
